document.discussion_title: Revealed! How Diana Penty prepped up for her character in 'Happy Bhag Jayegi' – Details inside
document.topic_text: Well, it wasn’t easy at all for Mumbai girl Diana Penty to portray a Punjabi character on-screen in her latest film ' Happy Bhag Jayegi '. Reportedly, the 30-year-old actress spent a lot of time in its research. »
